author: Edson Castaneda
comment: Very disappointed, give all permissions and watch face crashes always. Not recommend to anybody. Don't buy it is a waste of your money

author: Donald Knight
comment: Cannot get 12 hour mode to work. Stays on 24 hr time. My watch is the Huawei 2 Classic.

author: Erick N
comment: Needs to have customizable colours for both numbers and orange band. The second time needs to work instead of showing SEL. Needs option to disable steps or secondary time.

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback! We will take into account your wishes.

author: Jimmy Manos
comment: Watch face doesn't even show up in Android wear. I'd like a refund please

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content:
Please send the transaction number of your payment to the technical support service: support@mobimarketlabs.com
Thank you.

author: Jeremy Walker
comment: Well laid out, great looking ambient mode. I had a problem with the missed calls count, but the developers were very helpful and found and fixed it in a few days. Very pleased.
title: Great watchface

author: Inthikhab Raban
comment: Love this watch face. Only fix it need is I see that the SMS counter does not reset after reading the unread messages. Please please fix.

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: What is the launcher on your smart phone do you use? Thanks.

author: Jeremy Mayhew
comment: Great face but a 12hr option would be greatly appreciated

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content: We will add this feature in the near future. Thanks for your rate!

title: Could we get 12hr option? Instead of only 24hr.

author: Jeffrey Blattman
comment: No permissions it says over and over. No low bit short mode means screen burn in.

reply.author: Mobi Market Labs
reply.content:
To work correctly, you must set permissions for watch face on your smartphone. This operating principle Android.
We would appreciate if you will not hurry to put the rating.
If need help, email us for more information on support@mobimarketlabs.com
